context_bundle.summary: MCP Factory: Autonomous agent that builds Rust MCP servers from natural language specs. Powered by Haiku API. CLI: mcp-factory build "spec" [--name NAME]. Location: X:\mcp-factory\

onboarding.quick_start: CLI: mcp-factory build "Create an MCP server that does X" --name my-server. Agent parses spec → scaffolds Rust project → generates handlers → cargo build → outputs binary. Uses Haiku API (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env var). Output: X:\mcp-servers\{name}\target\release\
common_patterns: Agent reads existing MCPs as reference for patterns
known_errors: Path handling X:/ vs /mnt/x/ between Windows/WSL
